item.title: Kendo Instagram
item.description: Embedding Instagram We can easily embed Instagram photos with hashtags, using Hugo shortcodes. A post shared by Shuji Matsushita (@shujimatsushita) on Oct 2, 2016 at 3:54pm PDT Nito kento fight (2 sword) at Detroit Kendo Tournament A post shared by Gary Pang (@pangofhunger) on Feb 18, 2018 at 12:47pm PST
